fields.name: hatched
fields.description: Acquired by breeding. Ensure sire and dam are specified in bird record.

fields.name: banded
fields.description: Bird was given a new band. Also use this code when rebanding a bird, if the identity can be positively established.

fields.name: transferred in
fields.description: Acquired by transfer. Use this for birds from other labs/institutions, or for founders with unknown parentage.

fields.name: transferred out
fields.description: Bird left colony because it was transferred out to another lab/institution.

fields.name: died
fields.description: Bird was lost because of unanticipated death.

fields.name: lost
fields.description: Bird was lost because of a missing band or other unexplained reason.

fields.name: feathers
fields.description: Feathers plucked for genomic DNA recovery
